The graphic was published on Facebook on: 2020, and has been shared more than 150 times since.
The graphic suggests that wearing masks: 19 transmission, claiming that the transmission rate between a carrier and a non-carrier can drop from 100% to 1.5% if both parties wear masks.
There is a warning written in simplified: urging people to refuse intimate interactions with individuals not wearing masks, stating that all types of masks would work.
Professor Benjamin John Cowling: an expert in epidemiology and biostatistics, stated that there is no evidence to support the statistics cited in the graphic and that the effectiveness of masks may be overestimated. He also mentioned that while masks can reduce the transmission of virus-laden particles, they cannot eliminate them completely.
